transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: ha mam kekuthungala ippo
Customer: ha ippo kekuthu sir
Executive: ok fine fine fine sollungama
Customer: sir ippo na package eduthutu one month than one month kuda complete aagala sir
Executive: fine fine ok
Customer: ok va ippo vantha avanga namaku by lead eppadi edukanum intha maari experience kudukanum illaiya
Executive: kandippa kandippa kandippa
Customer: kudukanum sari athu athu pannitanga pannitu aduthavangala ippo engaloda maari package pota irukavanga oru five years seven years experience irukavanga irukanga ok va ippo ungaloda name vanthu popularity intha maari varanumna ivanga paarunga avangaloda listla ippadi irukku appadi sonnanga ok va sari ok aana avanga ethana varushathula irukanga seven years sollranga ok ok ok
Executive: ok
Customer: seven yearsla irukkumbothu avangalukku kandippa call pogum avangala vittutu enakku varathu ippove vantha udane ippo ivanga vanthu ungalukku business yen varala sari athu ella explanation kodukkuranga ok aana ivanga vanthu enakku vanthu at least calls varanum kandippa kandippa
Executive: kandippa
Customer: calls vara maari neenga vanthu athukku enna pannunum image change pannunum antha maari attract neenga pannunum athu thavara neenga avanga ippadi package three years at the time pannirukkanga athunala than avangalukku varathu neenga vanthu eppothulirunthu namma intha package podala ungalukku ok
Executive: ok
Customer: ithu oru kelviya enakku eppadi irukkum sir ippo na oru lead kuda oru business kuda na edukala india martla irunthu oru investment na 30000 investment pannurathukku one year na praveen kitta wait pannunga wait pannunga sonnen ethukuna en husband officela vanthu already invest pannanga oru business edukala sir private limited company ethunala than intha maari loose aalungalala than lead anuppa mattanga puriyutha thevai illama retail lead koduppanga ithu fraud appadi enakku en husband sonnanga already avangalukku kitta sandai podutha na vanthu package poten ok fine ungaloda enakku puriyuthu mam understand pannikiren with your permission ungalukku approach pannathu thappu than na illannu solla but at the same time neenga calls pathi ketrukinga pathingala direct calls pathi leave it as avanga enna pesinalum athu ellame vitturunga na scenario enna sollren calls vanthu pathingana ungalukku namma irukathu oru basic service ithula calls na varathu na suthama ungalukku varathu na solla matten ok va little bit call varum but aana based on visibility poruthu namma in case namma company name chennaila therinjathuna chennaila irunthu call varalam in case namma company name coimbatorela therinja coimbatorela irunthu call varalam ippadi than ungalukku vanthu na as a commitment kodukka mudiyathu mam ungalukku intha month oru 10 calls varum intha month oru 15 calls varum appadi sollittu as a commitment ennala kodukka mudiyathu ungalukku sir athu yaarumae kodukka mudiyathu sir neenga marketing because public requirement yaara irukka athu than automatic varamudiyum athu na vanthu purinjukiren commitment koduthuta appadina neenga ungaloda expedition expedition level is high correct ippo avanga vanthu pesurathu vanthu avanga intha vaarthai pesunanga paarunga enakku surruna yerutha illaiya neengalum enoda situationla iruntha ippo than 15 days aachu ne eppadi adutha package pathi pesure kandippa kandippa sollunga athu convey panna koodathu she should not ask me about the adutha package calls varala appadina varala explain pannirukkanum oru ippo 15 daysla oru 10 business eduthu irukkena madam ippo neenga vanthu irukka neenga ithu podunga appo ungalukku innum popularity irukkum kandippa ungalukku innum earn pannala antha maari iruntha situationla vantha solla she has to write ethume illama neenga vanthu adutha packagekagi pesurathukku vari enakku ellame pesittu lastla ippadi pesumbothu eppadi irukkum enoda time important meeting na vittutu vanthu network kadaikala sollittu veetla vanthu vasanthutu ivanga kitta pesuren half an hour lastla ippadi pesumbothu enakku eppadi irukkum sir en personal work ellam oram kattittu ivangalukku kitta intha katha pesurathukku than na vanthu freeya ukkanthen fine enakku puriyuthu mam ungaloda kovam enna puriyuthu ithukku appuram ippadi nadakkathu ungalukku calls pathi na sonnathu than ithu than unmai ithu vanthu pathingana based on visibility poruthu athu vanthu na kekala sir illa na solliren na solliren kandippa mam na ungalukku sonnana ungalukku answer kadacha maari irukkum ippo na enna sollren na neenga sonningala seven years customers irukkanga one month customers yaarumae ippadi paakka porathu kidaiyathu seven years customerskku vanthu enna benefit appadina avangalukku primary is a direct call and direct enquiry primary secondary is a by lead option by lead is a tool for the members ok ungalukku primary is a by lead by lead mooliyamathan ungalukku neenga conversiono illa neenga customer follow pannurathu adhika ungalukku by lead focus ungaloda focus fulla by leadla irukkum ok va secondary option is a direct call direct enquiry namma company name antha idathula theriyumbothu direct call direct enquiry varathukana possibility than suthama ungalukku varathu na mean pannala ok ok ithu than option kandippa oru approach antha idathula nadakkumbothu vanthu pathingana solli irukkanum athu vitham vanthu vera vithama solli irukkanum avanga sonna vitham thappa irukku i apologize for that maari ketruke ippo thirupi antha approach vanthu panna koodathu sir neenga vanthu oru six month kuda complete aagame intha approach pannurathu suppose na business 15 daysla na oru 10 lead eduthu nalla business pannittena she has to ask right kandippa kandippa puriyutha ithu vanthu ethume illama enakku eppadi irukkum sir antha momentla enakku anaikku vanthu peak time call elluna call adichitte irukka factoryla thiruppi call pannura na sari etho sari namakkagi ivanga call pannurangala sollittu na factory location vittutu na veettukku vanthu ange sattham kekkum factoryla ukkara mudiyathu andha pesura mudiyathu sollittu veettukku vanthu thiruppi na 5 kilometers factorykku veettukku ange irunthu inga vanthu ivakitta poi ivakitta intha vaarthai ketkurathukagi than na inga vantha ivakitta call pesurathu eppadi irukkum sir manasu enakku puriyuthu puriyuthu puriyuthu neenga enna sollringanu enakku puriyuthu ippadi irukka koodathu avangalukku with your permission ungalukku edhana account manager change pannuna kuda sollunga i will be change account manager pesave koodathu enakku call vantha avlothan avlothu appuram sari sari ok ok ok i will change your account manager i will just account manager ungalukku assign pannuren athukku appuram last final mam in neethi neenga oru non practice complaint koduthathunala oru query onnu namma complaint pannu raise aayirukku athunala than na en side irunthu call pannirukka ticket department athunala ungalukku na call pannirukka antha ticket namma close pannikalama with your permission antha ponna thooki podunga sir dhayavu seidhu ithu wrong commitment vanthu enakku really i will not give apology for her enakku avlo time waste pannirukka ethana perukku oru businessla time waste pannurathu half an hour andrathu vanthu romba important sir puriyutha antha maari staff vachiruntha ungalukke effective na kuda en kitta antha maari staff na vekka matten ok vekkathinga dhayavu seidhu puriyuthu enakku puriyuthu paravala oru ponna neenga edutha ungalukku onnume loss kidaiyathu departmentkku ungaloda kandippa action edukkura avanga mela onnum prachana illa andha query with your permission andha query mattum close pannikalama sollunga na close panniren sari ok close pannunga paravala na close pannittu recording ippo na ungalta pesunathunala enakku oru feedback ungalukku varum so athu namma 100% satisfaction kodunga ok ithuvume enoda number than in case ungalukku edhana doubt iruntha kuda neenga tharalama enakku call pannalam ok sir ok fine mam fine na ungalukku close pannittu na ungalukku oru notification receive aagum mail or india mart app enge receive aagum athu neenga satisfaction kodunga ok sir ok thank you so much fine fine thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Dissatisfied with the account manager's approach.

- Frustrated with the time wasted on unproductive calls.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the account manager's behavior.

- Assured that such incidents will not happen again.

- Promised to change the account manager.

- Explained the difference in benefits for different subscriptions.

- Offered his direct number for future assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will change the account manager.

- Executive will close the non-practice complaint ticket.

- Customer will receive a feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, customer service, complaint, resolution
